title: Police investigate Upper Darby shooting
content:
UPPER DARBY, Pa. (WPVI) --
Police in Delaware County are looking for a gunman that sent at least one person to the hospital.
The shooting happened around 10:30 p.m. Saturday on the 7000 block of Ruskin Lane in Upper Darby.
Police say one person was shot and rushed to the hospital.
There is no word on a condition.
